001package andesite.player.filter;
002
003import com.github.natanbc.lavadsp.rotation.RotationPcmAudioFilter;
004import com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.filter.AudioFilter;
005import com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.filter.FloatPcmAudioFilter;
006import com.sedmelluq.discord.lavaplayer.format.AudioDataFormat;
007import io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject;
008
009import javax.annotation.CheckReturnValue;
010import javax.annotation.Nonnull;
011import javax.annotation.Nullable;
012
013public class RotationConfig implements Config {
014    private float rotationHz = 5f;
015    
016    public float rotationHz() {
017        return rotationHz;
018    }
019    
020    public void setRotationHz(float rotationHz) {
021        this.rotationHz = rotationHz;
022    }
023    
024    @CheckReturnValue
025    @Nonnull
026    @Override
027    public String name() {
028        return "rotation";
029    }
030    
031    @CheckReturnValue
032    @Override
033    public boolean enabled() {
034        return Config.isSet(rotationHz, 5f);
035    }
036    
037    @CheckReturnValue
038    @Nullable
039    @Override
040    public AudioFilter create(AudioDataFormat format, FloatPcmAudioFilter output) {
041        return new RotationPcmAudioFilter(output, format.sampleRate)
042                .setRotationSpeed(rotationHz);
043    }
044    
045    @CheckReturnValue
046    @Nonnull
047    @Override
048    public JsonObject encode() {
049        return new JsonObject().put("rotationHz", rotationHz);
050    }
051}
